meanings.definition: Occurred at the same time or place.
meanings.sent1: The coincided events made the day exciting.
meanings.sent2: The coincided schedules allowed for a smooth transition.
meanings.sent3: It was a happy coincidence when their birthdays coincided.
meanings.sent4: The stars' paths coincided in a beautiful dance across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the rainbow coincided perfectly after the rain.

meanings.sent1: Their coincided interests led to a strong friendship.
meanings.sent2: The coincided personalities made them a great team.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing how their tastes coincided in food choices.
meanings.sent4: Their thoughts coincided like two puzzle pieces fitting together.
meanings.sent5: The music and lyrics coincided harmoniously in the song.
